title: Why is Jhin getting another skin?
body: Blood moon was not too long ago.

replies.body:
popular champs who fit in themes get skins because riot is a company.

and companies like money.
TF never fitted in blood moon...
I don't see TF seeing or talking to the dead or any communications with the dead.

Just because you don't see it doesn't mean many other people do.

It's your OPINION


me and many other people's opinions say he does.


Also, tf has nothing to do with jhin getting another skin so stick the jhin topic.
Like I said skin too soon.

It's not too soon

Cause as riot sees that the majority of opinions like jhin


The business side takes to that to make profit, popularity = more income.

Popular champ jhin get another skin.
Keep up the constant singular trend and folks will stop buying much of it. I already stopped on Zed at Project with original art.
What one person does won't dictate the majority fam, and even then they will just move on to the next thing
TF never fitted in blood moon... Also, I never have seen a Supergalaxy Zilean or Bard made when time and space is literally it.
Okay... Literally doesn't change the fact that Jhin is easy to fit into many themes, and is very popular.
I know he fits, too soon for another skin.

I mean, if it's not cutting into the sales of his last skin, is it?

It may be too soon for you to appreciate it, but people are going to buy it.
It's so fast, why not give {{champion:82}} a skin? Or {{champion:110}}
Because Morde is a disaster that's going to get reworked sooner rather than later, and Varus just isn't as popular of a champion that got Darkstar not that long ago.
Morde was poppin in Challenger last week.
Doesn't change the fact that inside his armor, instead of a body, there is only spaghetti code that is constantly glitching.

> [{quoted}](name=Suitaro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wERu8Ed7,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-12T11:09:53.979+0000)
>
> It's so fast, why not give {{champion:82}} a skin? Or {{champion:110}}

Or sivir,sivir only has 1 975 skin and 1350 and up and shes 7 years old

Jhin has 4 1350 and hes not even 2 years old
Careful now,its ok for this community for jhin to be showered in skins for some reason, you will surely be down voted
